files.patch:
@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
-# Copyright (c) 1996, 2019, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+# Copyright (c) 1996, 2022, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -45,0 +45,5 @@
+$(CLASSDIR)/META-INF/services/%: $(JAVADIR)/META-INF/services/%
+	$(RM) -f $@
+	if [ ! -d $(@D) ] ; then $(MKDIR) -p $(@D) ; fi
+	$(CP) $(@:$(CLASSDIR)/%=$(JAVADIR)/%) $@
+

@@ -66,1 +66,1 @@
-	$(GREP) -s 'Test results: passed: 156; error: 84' $(@:%.ok=%/log)  > /dev/null
+	$(GREP) -s 'Test results: passed: 157; error: 84' $(@:%.ok=%/log)  > /dev/null

@@ -0,0 +1,34 @@
+/*

+ *

+ * or visit www.oracle.com if you need additional information or have any
+ * questions.

+
+/* @test
+ * @summary Passed: Execution successful
+ */
+
+public class ToolProvider
+{
+    public static void main(String [] args) {
+        java.util.spi.ToolProvider.findFirst("jtreg")
+            .orElseThrow(() -> new AssertionError("`jtreg` not found by name"));
+    }
+}
